info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 12:43PM EDT until April 14 at 5:45AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana...
Wabash River.
Wildcat Creek near Lafayette.
.Lowland flooding has developed along the length of the Wabash River due to rainfall of generally three to eight inches in the Wabash basin. Significant flooding is expected to develop on the lower Wabash, with Mount Carmel surpassing moderate flood stage on Monday. The crest on the Wabash was approaching Lafayette this afternoon and is expected to reach Mount Carmel around Saturday April 12.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Wabash River at Terre Haute.
* WHEN...Until Monday, April 14.
* IMPACTS...At 22.5 feet, Extensive flooding behind Honey Creek Levee as a result of two unrepaired levee breaks from the April 2013 flood. This levee is maintained by the Honey Creek Levee Association. Flood waters behind the Honey Creek levee inundates most roads and affects a few residences and or commercial activities.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EDT Sunday /10:30 AM CDT Sunday/ the stage was 21.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:30 AM EDT Sunday /10:30 AM CDT Sunday/ was 21.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.2 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday, April 13. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 345 AM EDT /245 AM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY, APRIL 14

area.areaDesc: Clark, IL; Crawford, IL; Sullivan, IN; Vigo, IN
